content: Navigate to CycleTLS-Proxy directory and examine project structure
Run `go mod tidy` to resolve dependencies
Check for compilation errors and fix any issues found
Start the server for basic functionality testing
Test basic proxy functionality with a simple request
Verify that different browser profiles work
Test error handling with invalid requests
Test key functionality like header forwarding and session management
Try building the Docker image to verify Dockerfile works
Test that all Docker dependencies are properly handled
Fix any issues found during testing
Provide comprehensive summary of test results
